sqlReaderQuery.value:
;
WITH	MemberList AS	(
						SELECT	dm.SiteId,
								dmc.MemberId,
								dmc.ChildMemberId
						FROM	dbo.DimMember dm
									JOIN 
								dbo.DimMemberChild dmc
									ON dm.SiteId = dmc.SiteId
										AND dm.MemberId = dmc.MemberId
						WHERE	$partition.pf_DimMember(dm.SiteId) = $partition.pf_DimMember(@{pipeline().parameters.SiteId})
								AND $partition.pf_DimMemberChild(dmc.SiteId) = $partition.pf_DimMemberChild(@{pipeline().parameters.SiteId})
								AND dm.IsNonMember = 0
								AND dm.IsDeleted = 0
								AND dm.IsDeceased = 0
								AND dm.IsInternalAccount = 0
						GROUP	BY dm.SiteId,
								dmc.ChildMemberId,
								dmc.MemberId
						),
		DeliveryList AS	(
						SELECT	fea.SiteId,
								fea.SubCommunityId,
								fea.EmailId,
								fea.EmailRecurrenceId,
								fea.MemberId,
								CASE WHEN SUM(fea.DeliverCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DeliverCount,
								MIN(fea.DateKey) AS DeliverDateKey
						FROM	dbo.FactEmailAction fea
						WHERE	$partition.pf_FactEmailAction(fea.SiteId) = $partition.pf_FactEmailAction(@{pipeline().parameters.SiteId})
								AND fea.DateKey >= @{item().StartDateKey}
								AND fea.DateKey < @{item().EndDateKey}
								AND fea.DeliverCount > 0
						GROUP	BY fea.SiteId,
								fea.SubCommunityId,
								fea.EmailId,
								fea.EmailRecurrenceId,
								fea.MemberId
						),
		OpenClickList AS	(
							SELECT	fea.SiteId,
									fea.SubCommunityId,
									fea.EmailId,
									fea.EmailRecurrenceId,
									fea.MemberId,
									CASE WHEN SUM(fea.OpenCount) > 0 OR SUM(fea.ClickCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS OpenCount,
									CASE WHEN SUM(fea.ClickCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ClickCount,
									CASE 
										WHEN 	MAX(CASE WHEN fea.OpenCount > 0 THEN DateKey ELSE 19000101 END) >= MAX(CASE WHEN fea.ClickCount > 0 THEN DateKey ELSE 19000101 END) 
										THEN 	MAX(CASE WHEN fea.OpenCount > 0 THEN DateKey ELSE NULL END)
										ELSE 	MAX(CASE WHEN fea.ClickCount > 0 THEN DateKey ELSE NULL END) 
									END AS LastOpenDateKey,
									MAX(CASE WHEN fea.ClickCount > 0 THEN DateKey ELSE NULL END) AS LastClickDateKey
							FROM	dbo.FactEmailAction fea
							WHERE	$partition.pf_FactEmailAction(fea.SiteId) = $partition.pf_FactEmailAction(@{pipeline().parameters.SiteId})
									AND fea.DateKey >= @{item().StartDateKey}
									AND (
										fea.OpenCount > 0
										OR fea.ClickCount > 0
										)
							GROUP	BY fea.SiteId,
									fea.SubCommunityId,
									fea.EmailId,
									fea.EmailRecurrenceId,
									fea.MemberId
							)
SELECT	dl.SiteId,
		dl.SubCommunityId,
		dl.EmailId,
		dl.EmailRecurrenceId,
		ml.MemberId,
		SUM(dl.DeliverCount) AS DeliverCount,
		ISNULL(SUM(ocl.OpenCount),0) AS OpenCount,
		ISNULL(SUM(ocl.ClickCount),0) AS ClickCount,
		MIN(dl.DeliverDateKey) AS DeliverDateKey,
		MAX(ocl.LastOpenDateKey) AS LastOpenDateKey,
		MAX(ocl.LastClickDateKey) AS LastClickDateKey
FROM	MemberList ml
			JOIN 
		DeliveryList dl
			ON ml.SiteId = dl.SiteId
				AND ml.ChildMemberId = dl.MemberId
			LEFT JOIN
		OpenClickList ocl
			ON dl.SiteId = ocl.SiteId
				AND dl.SubCommunityid = ocl.SubCommunityid
				AND dl.EmailId = ocl.Emailid
				AND dl.EmailRecurrenceid = ocl.EmailRecurrenceId
				AND dl.MemberId = ocl.MemberId
GROUP	BY dl.SiteId,
		dl.SubCommunityId,
		dl.EmailId,
		dl.EmailRecurrenceId,
		ml.MemberId

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT	dd.DateKey AS StartDateKey,
		ddn.DateKey AS EndDateKey
FROM	dbo.DimDate dd
			JOIN
        dbo.DimDate ddn
			ON dd.FirstDayOfNextMonth = ddn.Date
WHERE	dd.DateKey >= 20170101
		AND dd.DateKey < 20200101
		AND dd.DAY = 1
ORDER	BY dd.DateKey
